review: I really enjoy my fire TV stick, it's nice having a remote to use with it instead of the chromecast where if your phone shuts off or you lose Bluetooth connection and you can't pause your TV show or movie, plus I get my Prime Instant video on here too which chromecast doesn't offer either, i'm going to buy another one of these for my bedroom :)

review: Love it!  Easy to set up and use. There is lots of content to choose from, and everything really does load fast. I did find it was easier to load my watch list on the web site than from the Fire TV Stick itself. Can't wait to try it with Netflix content too. It will be nice to have all my streaming media in one place.
